paper.title: The Research on Financial Early-warning Model about Listed Electric Power Enterprises based on Support Vector Machine
paper.abstract: The Electric Power Enterprises arc faced with more complex risk than ever before with the introduction of competition mechanism. Then financial early-warning of Electric Power Enterprise is becoming increasingly important. Recently, Support Vector Machine (SVM) is an effective tool for dealing with the nonlinear problem. This paper will introduce it to the listed Electric Power Enterprise for financial early warning, proposed financial early-warning of the listed Electric Power Enterprise based on Support Vector Machine. Empirical studies show that this model can overcome many inadequacies which may appear in existed model and improve the forecast accuracy.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用支持向量机（SVM）进行电力上市企业的财务预警，这属于金融风险管理中的企业财务风险预警范畴。
